product_name: Avid Shorty 4 Cantilever Brake Set - Black
long_description: Hear the cheering of the crowds? Check out the black version of the Avid Shorty 4 brake set and see what the excitement is all about. Rim brakes feature Avid time-tested pads and hardware; new arm design reduces vibration and is lighter than ever. Made of forged aluminum for stiffness and strength. Force Vector Alignment(TM) improves performance, efficiency and control. Separate sleeve ensures consistent performance regardless of the brake boss. Linear spring ensures positive spring rate, just like side-pull brakes. Screw-style spring adjuster accommodates easy brake centering. Includes 1 brake set that can be used on either front or rear.
